rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move a counter from a permanent you control or a card you own in exile to Revealer of Bounty.
Whenever Revealer attacks, you may remove up to three time counters from it. If you do, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each counter removed this way.
notes: Needs to change because the archetype changed from time counters to +1/+1 counters.
